name: Aji Verde
keywords: Aji Verde, Peruvian Green Sauce, Spicy Sauce, Creamy Sauce, Jalapeno Sauce, Coriander Sauce, Cilantro Sauce, Greek Yoghurt Dip, Condiment, Dip, Peruvian Cuisine, South American, No-cook recipe, Blender recipe, Quick and Easy, Spicy, Creamy, Tangy, Garlic, Lime, Vegetarian, Gluten-Free
description: A vibrant and creamy Peruvian green sauce, Aji Verde is a quick no-cook condiment that balances the spicy kick of jalapenos with the fresh taste of coriander and the tang of lime juice. Made smooth with Greek yoghurt and olive oil, it's a versatile sauce perfect as a dip or a topping for grilled meats and vegetables.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all ingredients except olive oil and yoghurt. Slowly blend in olive oil. Mix in the yoghurt and season to taste with salt and pepper. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Blend

notes: Original recipes contain mayonaise, personally I much prefer this with just the yoghurt but mix and match with mayo as desired!
If you blend in the yoghurt it gets watery.
Add or remove jalapenos as desired to make it milder or hotter, it doesn't change too much of the core flavour.
Fantastic fresh sauce that goes great with chicken wings, salads or rice dishes.
